## Token type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Token<T extends TokenType, U> = [
    /** The type of token */
    T,
    /** The token representation */
    string,
    /** Start position of representation */
    number,
    /** End position of representation */
    number,
    /** Extra data */
    U
];
```
**References:** [TokenType](./css-tokenizer.tokentype.md)
